name: Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101: 7 Stunning Benefits of This Ultimate Shine Enhancer
description:
Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101: The Ultimate Shine for Your Lips

Discover the luxurious Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101, a premium lip product designed to give your lips the perfect combination of color, shine, and nourishment. This exceptional lipgloss delivers a high-impact glossy finish while keeping your lips hydrated and comfortable throughout the day. 💋

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101 features a non-sticky formula that glides on smoothly, creating a glass-like shine that catches the light from every angle. The shade 101 offers a versatile neutral tone with subtle shimmer particles that enhance your natural lip color while providing dimension and fullness.

Product Information

Size 8ml / 0.27 fl oz
Product Type Lipgloss
Finish High Shine with Shimmer
Shade 101 - Neutral Pink
Brand Name Focus Point

Key Features of Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101

  • ✨ Long-lasting shine without stickiness
  • ✨ Hydrating formula with vitamin E and jojoba oil
  • ✨ Precision applicator for perfect application
  • ✨ Lightweight feel with buildable color
  • ✨ Subtle vanilla scent
  • ✨ Paraben-free and cruelty-free

The Perfect Gleam Experience

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101 is designed for those who want both beauty and comfort. The innovative formula contains light-reflecting particles that create the illusion of fuller lips while the nourishing ingredients keep your lips soft and supple. The ergonomic applicator ensures precise application, allowing you to create the perfect pout with minimal effort.

Whether worn alone for a natural glossy look or layered over your favorite lipstick for added dimension, the Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101 is versatile enough for everyday wear or special occasions. 💄

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss typically last on the lips?

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 101 provides impressive wear time of 3-4 hours, depending on eating and drinking habits. The formula is designed to maintain its shine longer than traditional glosses while gradually fading evenly without leaving a patchy appearance. For maximum longevity, apply a thin layer of lip liner before your gloss application.

Complete your makeup collection with our Focus Point Matte Revolution Lipsticks, Focus Point Flawless Foundation, or try our bestselling Focus Point Dramatic Volume Mascara. For a complete lip care routine, don't miss our Focus Point Overnight Lip Mask.
